website_summaries.verdict: Great numeric keypad with two USB ports for additional accessories. Easy setup, compatible with range of operating systems.
pros: Possesses 19 keys for easy data input
Buyers have peace of mind with included one-year limited warranty
Stand-out feature is the two USB plugs for accessories
Is versatile in compatibility as it works with most currently available operating systems
cons: Included cord is only about 2-feet long

customer_reviews.title: Simple problem - perfect solution.
customer_reviews.text: The simplicity of this product is its virtue. It does exactly what you expect - no more - no less. My laptop doesn't have a number pad and I didn't like the "laggy-ness" of Bluetooth number pads so I gave this a shot. It also has a single USB port of its own, so - if you already use a wired mouse - you can use this without having to sacrifice any additional ports. It doesn't weigh anything, but the buttons feel "solid." Best of all, it includes a button we've all wanted to push from time to time (see picture). ;-) (nb. It's a backspace key.)
customer_reviews.author: Edwin L. Chandler

customer_reviews.title: Two birds with one stone.
customer_reviews.text: Genuinely the best USB mini keypad on the market. Targus makes an alternate without the triple 0 key and to be honest the quality isn't half of what this one is. I've used the alternate Targus keypad (AKP10US) only to find it doesn't have the same level of quality and durability that this one does. I've purchased this particular keypad on numerous occasions for my employees only for them to comment on how much they've liked it as well. Last but not least, I love how this particular model includes a USB hub as well. Two birds with one stone so to speak. :)
customer_reviews.author: Chapel

customer_reviews.title: Two birds with one stone.
customer_reviews.text: Genuinely the best USB mini keypad on the market. Targus makes an alternate without the triple 0 key and to be honest the quality isn't half of what this one is. I've used the alternate Targus keypad (AKP10US) only to find it doesn't have the same level of quality and durability that this one does. I've purchased this particular keypad on numerous occasions for my employees only for them to comment on how much they've liked it as well. Last but not least, I love how this particular model includes a USB hub as well. Two birds with one stone so to speak. :)
customer_reviews.author: Chapel

customer_reviews.title: Wait - the extra ports are just USB 1.1?
customer_reviews.text: Yes, they are. So I plug my mouse into one of them, which works perfectly. The mouse and the number pad come out of the bag together, and go into just one USB port. If I am serious enough about the momentary project to pull out the number pad, you can be sure I am using the mouse as well. I still have one port left on this thing that I can use for something else.
customer_reviews.author: Matt in NH

customer_reviews.title: Great for Teachers
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my wife(math teacher). She uses it for entering grades and such. This is the second one that we have owned. The dog chewed the first. It works with both laptops. Just plug and play, on both windows XP and Windows 7. We have not tried it on our windows eight laptop yet, but I would be surprised if there was any issue. Good enough for daily use. Not to heavy, and doesn't seem to mind being dropped off her lap and onto the floor occasionally. Cheap enough that you don't cry when it's time to replace it.
customer_reviews.author: D. Flowers

customer_reviews.title: I use the keypad as a remote pendant when locating (x,y,z) zero on my CNC router
customer_reviews.text: I bought this numeric keypad to use with my Nextwave Shark CNC router to use as a remote pendant to locate the (x,y,z) zero of a work piece on the cnc table. Locating the exact (x,y,z) zero to within 0.001" is tedious but using this keypad to job to the exact spot makes it easier because I can stand close to the cnc table as opposed to using the computer keypad.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne

customer_reviews.title: Works Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: It is exactly what I needed. When I attach it to my laptop I can easily enter numbers when I'm working with a lot of numerical data.
customer_reviews.author: VW

customer_reviews.title: Works, but with issues.
customer_reviews.text: There is a helpful post about connecting this device to a Mac. That was very helpful. I've had this device now for about three weeks and find myself missing the placement of keys frequently while doing calculations. The placement of the 000 key is awkward and the largest key being "enter" rather than an addition key is cumbersome to one who learned ten key calculation on a standard ten-key device. However, it sure beats trying to use the top row on a laptop keyboard. If I were making this purchase again I'd pay more attention to the placement if the keys.
customer_reviews.author: jsp

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great quality USB keyboard that is an add on to my current laptop. It makes spreadsheet work a lot faster and easier. I don't use this everyday, but plug it into the laptop when needed. It is compact for travel. It also works with no problems on my MacBook Pro. I agree that if you are great at 10 key typing this might not be the keyboard for you, but it works great for the average spreadsheet user.
customer_reviews.author: Reviewer Dave

customer_reviews.title: Works like a regular ten key on a keyboard
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't lag and is very responsive. No scratches or dents when it arrived. I would recommend this to anyone that needs this. I mainly needed it because I have no ten-key on my keyboard. I took one star off because there are two digits at the bottom of the keypad. A Zero and 3 Zeros.(0 & 000). Im use to one big bar. The presence of two keys down there get in the way all the time but does not effect the use of it.
customer_reviews.author: RougeSpeed

customer_reviews.title: Ordered for a customer who needed a Ten Key Pad for his laptop
customer_reviews.text: His Windows 7 computer installed it without need for device drivers and he uses it regularly when balancing his checkbook. Another great product for a great price. Paul Buckner, author of From Broke To Broker: Stories of Finding Financial Freedom And Never Give Up: Book Two of the Finding Financial Freedom Series
customer_reviews.author: Paul Buckner

customer_reviews.title: Very nice item
customer_reviews.text: This USB keypad is a great addition if you use a laptop and need to use numbers frequently. The product was reasonably priced and has a solid feel/constructed well. Ordered eight for laptops used to prepare free tax returns for low-income clients in January 2011. The volunteers found them easy to use and very helpful. If you are looking for a reasonably priced USB keypad, give this one a try.
customer_reviews.author: Gaetano B

customer_reviews.title: A good product - but not perfect
customer_reviews.text: I use a laptop and sometimes need to enter a large amount of numbers into various applications, so I really missed having a keypad on my keyboard. The Targus Ultra Mini USB keyboard really goes a long way to replacing the normal keyboard keypad. The extra USB port is a nice extra as well. The only complaint I have is that the keypad lies flat without a built in way to tilt it to a more comfortable angle.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works well.
customer_reviews.text: I've had this keypad for quite awhile. It's now on its second laptop. I haven't had any problems with it. I'm not very fast on the keypad, so I haven't run into any speed issues. I've used it on a Dell XP, and am now using it on an ASUS Windows 8.1. You can start using it as soon as it's plugged in.
customer_reviews.author: mm

customer_reviews.title: The product did not work as a usb Hub. ...
customer_reviews.text: The product did not work as a usb Hub....The keypad did work - I believe the issues is that I am hooking this up to the "Keyboard" port on the device (PC) and not the (used) USB port. I also this device will NOT send Hotkey commands. Returning unit trying another brand. Done with Targus.
customer_reviews.author: Trailer Boy

customer_reviews.title: It does the job. 4 starts because there have ...
customer_reviews.text: It does the job. 4 starts because there have been time my computer has been locked up and I would have to re-start to make it work again. I believe the devise might cause it but I am not sure.
customer_reviews.author: teeinep

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed for use with my laptop. Just received it today. Plugged it in and new drivers and updates downloaded immediately. It is compact and light weight but seems robust and well made. Full size keys operate smoothly. I am already using all the USB ports in my laptop so I need the extra USB ports it provides.
customer_reviews.author: Saul W.

customer_reviews.title: Targus
customer_reviews.text: My old Targus died Ordered a new one, It shipped immediately, didn't work Told tec support I had a Mac They sent me a replacement immediately, received it the next day. Didn't work, found out it's not Mac compatable. So I ordered a iHome USB Numeric Keypad instead
customer_reviews.author: Rossco

customer_reviews.title: Great for laptop
customer_reviews.text: I prefer the side keypad to the numbers at the top. I just find it faster to use.
customer_reviews.author: Janet Holmes

customer_reviews.title: Bait & switch
customer_reviews.text: The item I received was not as pictured. The picture and description referenced 2 USB ports but the item I received had none.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Life Saver!
customer_reviews.text: I hate trying to type on the number keys at the top of my corporate laptop when I am at home. The Targus 10-key pad works perfectly and saves me so much time. I am a reporting analyst and programmer and deal most of my time in numbers. A perfect addition.
customer_reviews.author: NYCKatieP

customer_reviews.title: OK
customer_reviews.text: Works OK but lies flat with no way to slant it for people used to a regular keyboard slant. Also not really that small. But for the size of the keys it is the smallest it could be. Maybe the "mini" relates to the fact is is pretty thin. Overall good addition to laptop work accessory.
customer_reviews.author: Living In Irvine, CA

customer_reviews.title: Efficient, Good Key Feel
customer_reviews.text: Just like the one I have at work, but a newer model. BUT - I'd dearly love to find one of these with an equal = key and a comma , key so I could enter simple Excel formulae and statements without having to use the big keyboard so much.
customer_reviews.author: G. Troutman

customer_reviews.title: No bells and whistles...thankfully :)
customer_reviews.text: It does what it's supposed to do, don't know what more to say about a keypad, as it doesn't have bells and whistles to ding and tweet, although, I guess you could do a simple tweet with it... or you could ring a bell with it, but I wouldn't recommend it, as it would be abuse, and would void the warranty.
customer_reviews.author: Paul L

customer_reviews.title: Weird packaging; decent product
customer_reviews.text: I thought it was strange when my number pad showed up in an envelope with only a polybagged number pad inside. There was no box, no instructions, nothing but the pad. It works with my Mac, but I had to follow someone else's comment/instructions to hold the number lock button down before and as I was plugging it in. An instruction manual with this info would have been nice. Good thing that I had seen the comment/post of someone else before I got it. Other than that the number pad works great. A little difficult to get used to simply because it is different than the number pad I am used to.
customer_reviews.author: Amberry Storm

customer_reviews.title: Solid device - flawless on a Mac
customer_reviews.text: I tried it with and without the previous poster's suggestion about holding numlock and the keypad worked flawlessly with my last gen MacBook Pro. I wish the keys were tighter as they feel cheap but hey, it's cheap and SO much better than hunting and pecking on this blasted regular number portion of the MacBook keyboard.
customer_reviews.author: Starr Brown

customer_reviews.title: Works great with my hp laptop
customer_reviews.text: Works great with my hp laptop. I use it when traveling to keep up with sales from my online store. Just plug it in and it is ready to use. Makes calculation a lot fast than using the number row on the keyboard.
customer_reviews.author: W. Howard

customer_reviews.title: Junky
customer_reviews.text: I used this four times for about 5 minutes each time. The five does not work. Very cheap. Something this inexpensive I need to buy locally, so it is not a hassle to return-- for the $15 I paid for this, I am just going to throw it away.
customer_reviews.author: Faith Griffith

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Compliment for Apple Laptops
customer_reviews.text: This works well enough to use for apple mac laptops (2010). The key is to hold the "num lock" before connecting it to the usb drive. keep holding the "num lock" key until the mac beeps or 10 seconds, then you'll be able to use the keypad.
customer_reviews.author: H. Ly

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: The seller priced the item as if it were used. The item arrived as new. This was a very good deal!
customer_reviews.author: Clint

customer_reviews.title: 10 key
customer_reviews.text: well needed as the one I had before broke and needed a replacement. fits perfect between my laptop and my mouse pad. keys are big enough to allow the 10-key typing.
customer_reviews.author: Tanya M

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: This keypad has a good response, and feels very similar to my Dell keyboard. It is sturdy and stays in place. It was quickly recognized on one of our laptops from 2000. I only wish I could find one with a large Zero on the bottom.
customer_reviews.author: redcat72

customer_reviews.title: Number Pads
customer_reviews.text: These are very dependable and they have lasted nearly 10 years on our computers (smaller models with no number pads). I am glad to replace them with the original models again.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Shaw

customer_reviews.title: Suitable for laptops
customer_reviews.text: I recently purchased this device as my laptop didn't have a numeric keypad. As I do alot of accounting on my pc, having to use the numbers on the pc prove to be very difficult. But the Targus keypad solved all my problems, it's very easy to use, small and the two available USB ports, even though they are 1.0 makes it the best additive for my pc. It's a must have.
customer_reviews.author: A. Franklyn

customer_reviews.title: Handy keypad with 2 usb port hub.
customer_reviews.text: I don't remember if I knew it had 2 usb ports on top, but this has been great for programming and expansion for the Raspberry Pi device.
customer_reviews.author: aj4mq

customer_reviews.title: They're very useful when your laptop does not have a num pad
customer_reviews.text: They're very useful when your laptop does not have a num pad. In addition, smaller laptops now a days have very limited usb ports so it's great that it comes with a some on top.
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install and use
customer_reviews.text: I use this with my work laptop to enter grades. It works great. I even use the extra USB port(s) to attach my wireless mouse. Plug in and go.
customer_reviews.author: Rena Sapko

customer_reviews.title: Piece of crud
customer_reviews.text: This piece of crud worked for like a month or two, and then would only work every third time at best. I have stopped using it. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Fayanora

customer_reviews.title: Good!
customer_reviews.text: Unlike the last one I got,this one WORKS and my wife likes it. Good product and priced right. Would buy products from this company again. PS:Thanks to Amazon they took the one back that didn't work.Also credit shipping.Five ***** to them
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! I missed the use of my keypad when using the laptop and this allows me quick and easy access when I am working and the extra USB ports on it allow for expansion for other devices.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Jenny A. Bomar

customer_reviews.title: Targus Ultra Mini USB Keypad
customer_reviews.text: The item works well, comes with extra usb connections so that once you plug in you have to extra usb ports to use on the device. Easily portable and easy to connect.
customer_reviews.author: TawandaB

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing. Super easy and feels strong and sturdy. I am not an accountant so I cannot comment on how well it would work for fast pace number inputting.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonLover

customer_reviews.title: I bought a different one I liked better.
customer_reviews.text: I didn't care for this one. I bought a different one I liked better.
customer_reviews.author: sharon hopkins

customer_reviews.title: keypad
customer_reviews.text: Love this keypad. Feels like a calculator. Can not rate duability yet. Excellent for those who don't have a number keypad on their keyboard if they do a lot of spreadsheets like I do.
customer_reviews.author: jemcn

customer_reviews.title: Worked well
customer_reviews.text: The only issue is that I can't go back and forth between regular keyboard and this quickly. There is a slight delay. Also my computer was old so maybe this wouldn't be an issue in newer computers.
customer_reviews.author: amie lowery

customer_reviews.title: Good size, works great
customer_reviews.text: I use this at work and have been very pleased. I have a laptop that doesn't have a number pad and cannot do without one. I like having the extra USB ports as well.
customer_reviews.author: jhtiles

customer_reviews.title: Great Product when you don't have a full keyboard with numberpad on your laptop.
customer_reviews.text: Love this number pad. Great when you don't have a full keyboard on your laptop.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy77379

customer_reviews.title: Not for heavy use.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this for a road trip to survey vendors. The first day the wire had a loose connection and would turn on and off. Had to fiddle with the wire to get it on. When on the numbers do not always register. Very frustrating. I just need to buy a laptop with the 10 key on the keyboard.
customer_reviews.author: TonyK

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Never was able to get it to work on my laptop.
customer_reviews.author: Twostep23

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Asset for Laptops
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what was needed to use with a laptop that does not have keypad on the right.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works Great on  Macbook Pro!
customer_reviews.text: The Targus Numeric Keypad is a wonderful Device. since my Macbook does not have a Numpad, and i needed one..this seemed like the best candidate. and i wasn't proven wrong the slightest bit. helped me alot for college even though i've only had it for about a week! i also use Bootcamp on the laptop so i have Both Windows 7 and Mac OS Snow Leopard. it works great on both, no hiccups and no problems! truly a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Zambo

customer_reviews.title: Very cool!!
customer_reviews.text: Works well with my computer. I got a new laptop without the number pad and this really helps! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Navigator

customer_reviews.title: didnt use it for its purpose..
customer_reviews.text: bought it to tear apart to TRY and use for my dance pads I build..DIDNT work...BUT the keypad did work just fine as I used it before taking it apart..Good product for its purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Thorne

customer_reviews.title: Great Value!
customer_reviews.text: The devices perform well, as expected, and they were competitively priced. While I ordered black devices, grey/silver ones were shipped. However, now that they are installed, I like the grey even better. All's well the ends well!
customer_reviews.author: S. Merck

customer_reviews.title: There are better products.
customer_reviews.text: Some of the keys stick or don't connect when I press.
customer_reviews.author: Elba Villezcas

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good key pad, surprising how much you can miss this on a small laptop
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: There were no surprises nor disappointments with this product because of the descriptions and feedback provided. I like it and I'm glad I got it, it makes my job easier.
customer_reviews.author: Sal

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: It's a 10-key! And it works! I can finally do some data entry on my laptop without it taking twelve GD'd hours!
customer_reviews.author: Adam Piatt

customer_reviews.title: Serves its purpose
customer_reviews.text: Wish the cord was longer. Otherwise serves the purpose. Using in a facility where clients can put in codes and not have to use your personal keyboard.
customer_reviews.author: Tami M. Adams

customer_reviews.title: Neat attachment
customer_reviews.text: We use this for our laptop so we can have a 10-key. It works very well and also has an extra USB port which we attach our mouse to. Would highly recommend for a computer needing the speedy access of the 10-key. It is kinda frustrating to move around with the computer but that is to be expected since it's not apart of the computer.
customer_reviews.author: babyblue

customer_reviews.title: keypad
customer_reviews.text: For everyone who owns a laptop this is a necessity if you enter numbers frequently. The keys are big enough and installation was a snap. It sure beats hunting for those number keys on a laptop keyboard.
customer_reviews.author: Guyon Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Good find
customer_reviews.text: I have used other 10 keypads to attach to my laptop and I enjoy this one as it isn't cheap looking but is at a inexpensive price. The last one I had the keys stuck on it as it was incredibly cheap. With this one, I do not have to press down on the keys for it to input into the software I am using. I would buy this one again!!
customer_reviews.author: Pauline K Putman

customer_reviews.title: Great notebook addon.
customer_reviews.text: As a retired accountant after 20 years, I still prefer input of numbers using the ten key format. This addition to my notebook computer has been a terrific convenience.
customer_reviews.author: William F. Shirk

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality for price
customer_reviews.text: The feel of the keyboard is poor. I Didn't like quality of this keyboard product. Would not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Parker

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this.
customer_reviews.text: I use these for entering large check deposits and they are so much easier than my laptop keyboard.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Krien

customer_reviews.title: Great for business on the go
customer_reviews.text: I needed a 10 key for when I travel and don't have a physical keyboard. This 10 key worked on my laptop as soon as I plugged it in.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Sterf

customer_reviews.title: It works great but the buttons are in funny places...
customer_reviews.text: The zero button is split in half and while this keypad gives you "additional" functionality, I find I just simply do not use the "000" key all that often. I wish it was more like a standard keypad. Other than that, it works great.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel B.

customer_reviews.title: but worked great while it lasted
customer_reviews.text: Lasted about three years, but worked great while it lasted.
customer_reviews.author: Paul J. DiCaro Jr.

customer_reviews.title: 10 Key Pad
customer_reviews.text: This product met all my expectations. I was able to simply plug it in and start using it right away. I do quite a bit of production data entry from time to time and this allows me to do so on any of my laptops. It is easy to transport when I travel. Has been very reliable so far.
customer_reviews.author: Alia Rice

customer_reviews.title: No Complaints
customer_reviews.text: Works great, speeds up data entry on laptops! The extra USB ports are handy too!
customer_reviews.author: C. Densham

customer_reviews.title: This is the 2nd one I have ordered in the ...
customer_reviews.text: This is the 2nd one I have ordered in the last year. Lasted about 8 months then got a intermitting open in the cable.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Murch

customer_reviews.title: Great product, great price
customer_reviews.text: This is a very useful product when you have a laptop that doesn't have a separate numerical keypad and you need to input a lot of numbers.
customer_reviews.author: Thrifty Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Short cord!
customer_reviews.text: Cord is too short for use with a desktop computer. Only buy this one if you intend to use it for travel or laptop use. I had to order a USB extension cord to make this usable with my desktop.
customer_reviews.author: T. Emmert

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't be without it!
customer_reviews.text: Had to have this as my laptop didn't have the keypad. It has saved me so much time. High quality product and works great. Also love the two input usb plugs it has.
customer_reviews.author: Diane R. Milano

customer_reviews.title: Targus keypad makes life easier
customer_reviews.text: Using the keypad has been very easy. I use it at work and the built in hub is great. My laptop only has 3 ports on it so having the extra ports is great.
customer_reviews.author: A. Foster

customer_reviews.title: Great solution
customer_reviews.text: Family member studying accounting and using a laptop with no number pad. The works great! Breathing price fast shipping. Makes doing accounting work eazy.
customer_reviews.author: Don

customer_reviews.title: It Works perfect on a PC
customer_reviews.text: It Works perfect on a PC, the only problem is that it doesn't have a retractible cord, but for the rest, it is amazing.
customer_reviews.author: VERONICA ENRIQUEZ

customer_reviews.title: Good, economical solution to my problem
customer_reviews.text: Makes the laptop more efficient to have the 10 key pad. Good, economical solution to my problem.
customer_reviews.author: V. Bender

customer_reviews.title: no problems works great
customer_reviews.text: works just fine no issues so fare with it would recommend it or buy it again, half the price then at office max
customer_reviews.author: L.MEN

customer_reviews.title: Mini USB Keypad
customer_reviews.text: I love it and use it all the time with my computer. It has been a time saver, Thank you Sincerely Loretta Eoff
customer_reviews.author: Loretta Eoff

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what it was advertised as and got it in 2 days
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: No Mac OS
customer_reviews.text: Does not work on Mac OS Tiger or earlier. Seems to work okay on later Mac OS and probably Windows. It also doesn't send a real numlock key when you press it, and when numlock is off, it sends arrow keys instead of real numpad keys so it didn't work so well for some old computer games. But I'm sure it works fine if all you want to do is type spreadsheets into Microsoft Windows.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Value
customer_reviews.text: Works like a charm. Plugged into my notebook and no problems. Does more than it should for this price. Has built in usb ports as well.
customer_reviews.author: elad1493

customer_reviews.title: good product
customer_reviews.text: works really well, good quality.....why do I need to write 15 more words to complete this review for you? the end
customer_reviews.author: Sandy Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It was exactly what I was looking for, and came promptly.
customer_reviews.author: Kay Dager

customer_reviews.title: targus keypad
customer_reviews.text: Great product - worked well, however I found an almost indentical one at discount store for about 10$ - so at 17$ it was overpriced on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: act1975

product_meta.title: Targus Ultra Mini USB Keypad with USB Port Connector, True Plug-and-Play Device, Connects with Laptop, Desktop and Other Devices, Black (PAUK10U)
product_meta.description: The Targus Numeric Keypad with USB Hub provides convenience for mobile users with its slim and compact design. The extra “000” and “Back Space” keys allow for improved productivity and more efficient typing. The full size concave keys are designed for comfort and accuracy and require little or no learning curve. The two USB ports at the top of this keypad provide added connectivity for other devices like a mouse or a flash drive. This value-priced keypad is perfect for use when working on spreadsheets, accounting or financial applications.
feature_bullets: Connects to a laptop or desktop computer using an included cable with USB connector.
Full-size concave keys are comfortable and easy to use providing the perfect complement to your laptop. Great for anyone working on spreadsheets, accounting or financial applications.
USB port required. True plug-and-play device; no drivers required.
Limited warranty does not cover products purchased from 3rd party sellers
Faster Data Input: Low-Profile Key Design Allows for Convenient Data Input Ideal for Spreadsheet, Accounting and Financial Applications
Extra Functionality: "000" and "Backspace" Keys for Improved Productivity
Plug and Play Connectivity: Easy to Install, Simply Plug Into Your Notebook's USB Slot with No Drivers Required

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars169 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
